sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3597cc602f913010109d2f2ef699b63a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:76fea5262f613010109d2f2ef699b631</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>updateGroceryFields</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   g_form.getReference('product_name', displayInfo);
	
  function displayInfo(grocery) {  
  //g_form.setValue('product_name', productName);
  g_form.setValue('department', grocery.u_departments);
  g_form.setValue('on_sale', grocery.u_on_sale);
  g_form.setValue('price', grocery.u_price);
  }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nickmartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 16:42:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3597cc602f913010109d2f2ef699b63a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!#/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bcaafdee2f613010109d2f2ef699b61f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateGroceryFields</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bcaafdee2f613010109d2f2ef699b61f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nickmartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 16:04:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Grocery Information">97ae61a62f613010109d2f2ef699b6a3</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ad44f9aa2f613010109d2f2ef699b6bf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.grocery</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>grocery</name><script><![CDATA[var grocery = Class.create();
grocery.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	grocery_info : function() {
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		
		var grocery_detail = new GlideRecord('u_groceries');
		grocery_detail.addQuery('sys_id', 'u_product_name');
	    grocery_detail.query();
		while(grocery_detail.next()){
			result.product_name = grocery_detail.u_product_name;
			result.department = grocery_detail.u_departments;
			result.on_sale = grocery_detail.u_on_sale;
			result.price = grocery_detail.u_price;
	  }
	},
    type: 'grocery'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nickmartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-27 16:41:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad44f9aa2f613010109d2f2ef699b6bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>grocery</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ad44f9aa2f613010109d2f2ef699b6bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nickmartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 15:43:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3597cc602f913010109d2f2ef699b63a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:098daaaa2f253010109d2f2ef699b6cc</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Grocery User Details</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad(){

  var ga = new GlideAjax("requestor_details");
  ga.addParam("sysparm_name","requestor_info");
  ga.getXML(ajaxResponse);

  function ajaxResponse(serverResponse) {
  var result = serverResponse.responseXML.getElementsByTagName("result");
  var phone = result[0].getAttribute("phone");
  var user = result[0].getAttribute("user");
  var email = result[0].getAttribute("email");
	  
  g_form.setValue('phone_number',phone);
  g_form.setValue('user',user);
  g_form.setValue('email',email);
  }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nickmartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 14:31:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3597cc602f913010109d2f2ef699b63a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!#/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>98382eb62f213010109d2f2ef699b68f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Grocery User Details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_98382eb62f213010109d2f2ef699b68f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nickmartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 14:57:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="User Info">365d2aaa2f253010109d2f2ef699b614</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_27176eb62f213010109d2f2ef699b60b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.requestor_details</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>requestor_details</name><script><![CDATA[var requestor_details = Class.create();
requestor_details.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	requestor_info: function() {
	  var result = this.newItem("result");
	  var user_detail = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	  var logged_user = gs.getUserID();
	  user_detail.addQuery('sys_id',logged_user);
	  user_detail.query();
	  while(user_detail.next())
	  {
		  result.setAttribute("user",user_detail.sys_id);
		  result.setAttribute("phone", user_detail.mobile_phone);
		  result.setAttribute("email",user_detail.email);
	  }
  },
    type: 'requestor_details'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nickmartin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 14:25:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>27176eb62f213010109d2f2ef699b60b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestor_details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_27176eb62f213010109d2f2ef699b60b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nickmartin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 14:52:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
